meanings: 심각하다 serious, grave, keen, acute, poignant.

vlive.korean: [심각] 위에부터 하는 게 낫지 않아? [Serious] Why don't we start with top ones? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.22
vlive.english: [Serious] Why don't we start with top ones?

vlive.korean: [세상 심각] 어디 편에서요? [So serious] In which episode? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.100
삼각... 삼각김밥? - 심각... Triangle-shaped... kimbap? (Korean pun) - So serious... 듣기 View video NCT : 🐰♥️🐭🤍
[심각] 아니 왜 리허설할 때보다 살이 쪘지? [Serious] Why do I look more chubbier than at the rehearsal? 듣기 View video 이한결, 남도현 : [비하인드] 이한결, 남도현 1st Fanmeeting : HAPPY DAY
vlive.english: [Serious] Why do I look more chubbier than at the rehearsal?

vlive.korean: [심각] - 지민아 30초밖에 없어 - 이게 어렵다고? [Serious] - Jimin, we have 30 seconds. - Do you think it's hard? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.97
vlive.english: [Serious] - Jimin, we have 30 seconds. - Do you think it's hard?

examples.korean: The seriousness of the crime cannot be overstated. 발음듣기 그 범죄의 심각성은 아무리 과장해도 지나치지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The seriousness of the crime cannot be overstated. 발음

examples.korean: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality. 발음듣기 상황의 심각성이 전체적으로 헤아리기가 힘들다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality. 발음

examples.korean: I hope you realize the seriousness of this crime. 발음듣기 당신들이 이 범죄의 심각성을 인식하기를 바란다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I hope you realize the seriousness of this crime. 발음

examples.korean: He hasn’t yet woken up to the seriousness of the situation. 발음듣기 그는 아직 상황의 심각성을 깨닫지 못하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He hasn’t yet woken up to the seriousness of the situation. 발음

examples.korean: I don’t think you realise the gravity of the situation. 발음듣기 당신이 상황의 심각성을 깨닫지 못하고 있는 것 같군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t think you realise the gravity of the situation. 발음
